summary: A collection of FOMod installlers for mods that don't have ones.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This is a collection of FOMod installlers for mods that don't have ones and have to be installed manually.[/size]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]

[list=1]
[*][size=3]Download original mod[/size]
[*][size=3]Download corresponding FOMod installer[/size]
[*][size=3] Copy [color=orange]fomod[/color] folder from the installer archive to the root of the original mod archive[/size]
[*][size=3] Install mod using MO or NMM[/size]
[/list]
[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]Mods[/b][/size][/color]

[list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72091/?]Barbarous Beauty[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1330055]betterbecause[/url][b] [/b]- female body textures[/size]
[/list]
[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]Notes[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]I trying to test a installer on both ModOrganizer and Nexus Mod Manager. If you find any errors, pelase let me know.[/size]

[color=#93c47d]
[size=3]Don't forget to endorse original mods![/size][/color]

[size=3]Happy gaming![/size]
author: chintsu_kun
